metadata.title: eLUUGIE 100 Pairs 3D Cardboard Glasses Glasses Universal Anaglyph 3D Glasses Cardboard Paper Red Blue Cyan or Movie (100 Pairs)
features: 100 Pairs in Package! Item type: Paper 3D Glasses. Made of high quality material, comfortable to wear, durable.
White cardboard frames with temples for a low-cost solution of your anaglyph needs

With red and cyan filters, the glasses can be used for either red left or red right depending on which way you fold the temples. Two different fold-scores allow you to fit the glasses to smaller or larger viewer's heads
For Anaglyph Internet images, 3D Anaglyph DVDs (movies), Anaglyph Prints and wherever red/cyan images are to be found.
For 3D (Red and CYAN) viewing on internet, DVDs, VHS tapes and broadcast TV (anaglyph)Used for 3D (Red and CYAN) viewing on internet, DVDs, VHS tapes and broadcast TV (anaglyph)
description: These RED&BLUE anaglyph white cardboard glasses are unusually a one-time use.
Used for 3D (Red and CYAN) viewing on internet,DVDs,VHS tapes and broadcast TV (anaglyph) Also use them for 3D Video Games also and images galleries on the internet.
Put on these snazzy, white 3D glasses with red and blue lenses and watch your screen come alive and those images leap out at you from the pages of your magazine or your comic book.
These are paper card glasses that you can carry around with you wherever you go and are multimedia.
You can use them for viewing 3D prints, television, anaglyph videos, photos on the Internet and videos on YouTube, a lot of other publications and, above all, your favourite movies.
Wear these versatile red and blue (cyan) glasses for hours of comfortable and exciting viewing!
